name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat Bell - The icon that reminds you to follow-up

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set reminders for Slack channels, Telegram chats, LinkedIn conversations, and Gmail emails, natively in each app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your follow-up wingman ‚è∞ Right In every chat. Set reminders to follow up in Slack, Telegram, LinkedIn, Gmail and soon Twitter.
